# cook your dish here
t=int(input())
for i in range(t):
 D=int(input())
 P=10**5-2
 ans=[]
 if(D==0):
  ans.append(1)
 while(D>0):
  P=min(P,D)
  ans.append(P+2)
  ans.append(P+1)
  ans.append(1)
  D-=P
 print(len(ans))
 print(*ans,sep=" ")

# cook your dish here
def solve(d):
 op=[]
 p=(10**5)-2
 if d>0:
  while d>0:
   p=min(d,p)
   op.append(p+1)
   op.append(p+2)
   op.append(1)
   d= d-p
 else:
   op.append(d+1)
   op.append(d+2)
 print(len(op))
 print(*op)
def __starting_point():
 for test in range(int (input())):
  d=int(input())
  solve(d)
__starting_point()

# cook your dish here
def solve(d):
 op=[]
 p=(10**5)-2
 if(d>0):
  while d>0:
   p=min(d,p)
   op.append(p+1)
   op.append(p+2)
   op.append(1)
   d= d-p
 else:
  op.append(1)
 print(len(op))
 print(*op)
t=int(input())
for i in range(t):
 d=int(input())
 solve(d)

import sys;input = sys.stdin.readline
inp,ip = lambda :int(input()),lambda :[int(w) for w in input().split()]

for _ in range(inp()):
 n = inp()
 ans = []
 t = 10**5 -2
 for i in range(n//t):
  ans.extend([t+2,t+1,1])
 n = n%t
 ans.extend([n+2,n+1,1])
 print(len(ans))
 print(*ans)
